modName: Dark Eden ENB for Vivid Weathers
summary: Fantasy based preset for ELFX interiors and Vivid Weathers
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]Dark Eden ENB[/size]

[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/1fe68c4992957ed1b7a8b067293274f0/tumblr_p2fe221tZc1s2ptqso9_540.jpg[/img]﻿[/center]
[center][size=4]A fantasy style preset with vibrant and saturated days and bright moon-lit nights.[/size]



[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/04657be976df9b0dae3fe6d0a8688a28/tumblr_p2fe221tZc1s2ptqso5_540.jpg[/img]﻿


 
[size=3]by mobiusbelmont[/size]




[img]http://78.media.tumblr.com/7735ec9df8422caffffe74d9e761f8a6/tumblr_p2fe221tZc1s2ptqso2_540.jpg[/img]﻿


[size=4] designed for Vivid Weathers and ELFX interiors [/size]


[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/f120e2a6f96e81c64609fc9be53bbac4/tumblr_p2fe221tZc1s2ptqso3_540.jpg[/img]﻿


[size=4]For vanilla weathers, Climates of Tamriel, and Natural Lighting and atmospherics plugin use the version of Dark Eden ENB [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70713/]here[/url]﻿

[/center][left]﻿[size=5]Dark Eden ENB - original edition
[/size][size=3]A fantasy style preset with vibrant and saturated days and bright moon-lit nights.  This version has been tested and is compatible with almost every lighting and weather mod. [/size]




[size=4][size=5]Ignis Fatuus edition:[/size][size=2][size=3] 
foggy nights with an eerie green glow and  [/size][/size][/size][size=3]compatible with Night Eye (The title of this preset [Dark Eden], and this edition [Ignis Fatuus], are my homage to Blood Omen - Legacy of Kain.)[/size]




[size=5]Dark Eden ENB, Gothic Edition:[/size][size=4] 
old technicolor film style with minimal saturation. Version 3 and greater is now compatible with Night Eye


[/size]
[size=5]Dark Eden ENB, Nightshade Edition:[/size][size=4] [/size][size=3]similar to the original version but with higher bloom and more purple




Installation
1.Copy the d3d9.dll and enbhost files from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0266.htm]here[/url] to your Skyrim folder (wrapper version for BINARY 319 or greater)
2.Copy and paste the Dark Eden ENB files to your Skyrim folder containing the Skyrim.exe file (not your data folder).  
3. Edit your skyrimprefs.ini and set the following values:
[Display]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iMultiSample=0 
bFXAAEnabled=0 
iMaxAnisotropy=0


CONSULT THE STEP GUIDE FOR ENB FOR MORE INFORMATION ON HOW YOU SHOULD CONFIGURE YOUR enblocal files for YOUR RIG 
OR
check out[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74427/?] this great guide[/url] for ENB and Skyrim optimization


Follow me on tumblr: [url=https://www.tumblr.com/blog/belmontswhip]https://www.tumblr.com/blog/belmontswhip


[/url]CREDITS:
Boris Vorontsov - ENB Series Developer (http://enbdev.com/index_en.html)

high quality Depth of Field tweaks by Kobalk and team (from Rampage ENB)
bloom shader for Nightshade edition by Kobalk and team (Rampage ENB)
SMAA by mrhaandi (http://mrhaandi.blogspot.com/p/injectsmaa.html)
ultimate shader effect add-on by Miratheus (http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=3274)
Kyo- sunsprite shaders
palette textures by yours truly[/size][/left]
author: mobiusbelmont
